original_text: Make yourself an ark of gopher wood. Make rooms in the ark, and cover it inside and out with pitch.
korean_text: 너는 고페르 나무로 너를 위하여 방주를 만들되 그 안에 칸들을 막고 역청을 그 안팎에 칠하라

sentences.original_text: Make yourself an ark of gopher wood.
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 위해 고페르 나무 방주를 만들어라.

sentences.original_text: and cover it inside and out with pitch.
